name: Xtreme Break Chain Rivals
description:
Two cars are attached together with a steel chain in between the impossible track and you have on impossible stunt drive racing. The driver has to be careful because as soon as distance between the cars increases the chain breaks and you will lose

Features.
• Adventurous & exciting multiple challenging levels.
• Challenging chain car race.
• Realistic and smooth controls.
• HD and Marvelous 3D Graphics.
• Easy and free to play.
• Offline Game Play.
